episodes.title: Soulcycle Cult and The Future of Bravo
episodes.description:
Jess Rothschild shares about her experience at Soul Cycle in NYC. She tells how she was inspired to do a podcast docu series titled “Cult Body Soul”. From the sex to the lack of losing weight, we cover it all. What is the future of RHONY and Andy Cohen? Enjoy!
